title: Michael Jordan, Joe Burrow, Trevor Lawrence, OBJ
itunes:title: Michael Jordan, Joe Burrow, Trevor Lawrence, OBJ
description:
Colin talks about Michael Jordan being authentic and the media shouldn't ask him to change who he is. He feels Trevor Lawrence is a better player than Joe Burrow considering Burrow had more weapons. Also his thoughts on Odell Beckham Jr.s latest comments. Guests include John Middlekauff, Bryan Cox, J. A. Adande, and Penny Hardaway.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
